item.title: Music
item.description: In the Sands from Periphery, 2017 Periphery by Jonathan Davies A collection of story songs, in French and English, of stigma, otherness and irrelevancy / Une collection de chansons qui traite de la stigmatisation et l’isolement. Already Written All My Good Songs, 2016 Already Written All My Good Songs by Jonathan Davies A review of a decade of songwriting and experimentation with production and instrumentation / Des chansons écrites et enregistrées depuis une dixaine d’années.

item.title: Bio
item.description: Jonathan started early on the piano and plays to this day. He also had a brief but passionate acquaintance with the cello. But that was a long time ago. More importantly, he was introduced to the works of great composers - Vaughan Williams, Villa Lobos, Gershwin - as a small child. As a young adult he discovered, through campus radio and small, struggling bars and cafes, great musicians working away in relative obscurity.
